drawArrow

public static void drawArrow(float length)
Simply calls drawArrow(length, 0.05f * length)

See Also:
drawArrow(float, float)

drawArrow

public static void drawArrow(float length,
                             float radius)
Draws a 3D arrow along the positive Z axis.

length and radius define its geometry.

Use drawArrow(PVector, PVector, float) to place the arrow in 3D. Uses current color and does not modify the OpenGL state.

drawArrow

public static void drawArrow(processing.core.PVector from,
                             processing.core.PVector to,
                             float radius)
Draws a 3D arrow between the 3D point from and the 3D point to, both defined in the current ModelView coordinates system.

See Also:
drawArrow(float, float)

public static void cylinder(float w,

w defined the width of the cylinder and h its height

cone

                        float h)

cone

public static void cone(int detail,
                        float x,
                        float y,
                        float r,
                        float h)
cone taken from http://processinghacks.com/hacks:cone Thanks to Tom Carden

Places a cone with it's base centered at (x,y), height h in positive z, radius r.
